name: Magic kitchen
description:
This little witch try to feed her magic dog, but because it is magic too (and hungry), he shoots a lot of magic fireballs around all the kitchen, try to feed it with the correct food. And yes, the kitchen is in the yard.

All the sprites and music are of other artists, and in the credits are their names.

This is a little project for the community, this game probably won't get updates, cause i'm gonna focus on bigger projects, hope you enjoy it!

New update will come soon, with improvements in the gameplay and the game feel.
